title: Looking to buy Dahlen, Lajoie, and Marquard !!!
author: Hellwig

posts.post_title: Looking to buy Dahlen, Lajoie, and Marquard !!!
posts.post_content:
Just over a year into collecting and I never thought I’d be nearing 60 graded already.  So I’m looking for the following to knock off my list next.

SGC or PSA doesn’t matter

Dahlen (Boston) ACQUIRED 
Dahlen (Brooklyn) Beater more than likely unless you give me a nice deal ;)
Lajoie (Throwing) Under $225
Lajoie (Bat) Under $225
Marquard (Hands at side) Crease Free
Knocked one off the list! Thanks Bill!! Still looking for more.
